```py
>>> interv_arr = pd.arrays.IntervalArray([pd.Interval(0, 1), pd.Interval(1, 5)])
>>> interv_arr
<IntervalArray>
[(0, 1], (1, 5]]
Length: 2, dtype: interval[int64, right]
>>> interv_arr.closed
'right' 
```

```py
>>> interv_idx = pd.interval_range(start=0, end=2)
>>> interv_idx
IntervalIndex([(0, 1], (1, 2]], dtype='interval[int64, right]')
>>> interv_idx.closed
'right' 
```
